text: وله الجوار المنشـات فى البحر كالاعلم

translations.translation: His, too, are the ships sailing like mountain peaks on the sea.
His are the high-sailed vessels in deep ocean like the mountains.
His are the ships, towering on the sea like mountains.
By His command, the ships with raised masts sail on the sea like mountains.
To Him only belong the sailing ships, raised above the sea like hills.
And His are Al-Jawar Al-Munsha'at, in the seas like A`lam.
And His are the ships reared aloft in the sea like mountains.
His too are the ships that run, raised up in the sea like land-marks.
His are the ships displayed upon the sea, like banners.
His are the lofty ships, that rear aloft on the sea like mountains.
His are the ships with elevated sails upon the sea like mountains.
His are the sailing ships on the sea [appearing] like landmarks.
And His are the Ships sailing smoothly through the seas, lofty as mountains:
And His are the ships going and coming in the seas, like mountains.
Also, His are the ships that run, raised up like mountains upon the sea.
His are the ships, raised above the sea like landmarks.
And to Him belong the ships [with sails] elevated in the sea like mountains.
[55:24] His are the crafted ships [that sail] in the sea [appearing] like landmarks, like mountains in their tremendous size and height.
His are the ships displayed) floating (upon the sea, like banners) like mountains, that is when the ships raise their sails.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَلَهُ ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْمُنشَئَاتُ } فالجواري: السّفنُ والمُنشئاتُ: المجريات
 والأَعلامُ: الجبالُ واحدُها عَلَمٌ

translations.translation:
And His are the ships in the heavens and the earth {and the mountains}, and all that is therein, and all that is between them.


And the mountains: one of them is a sign.

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { وله الجوارِ } أي: السفن، جمع: جارية، { المُنشَئاتُ } المرفوعات الشُرَّع، وقرأ حمزة ويحيى بكسر الشين، أي: الرافعات الشُروع، أي القلاع، أو: اللاتي يُنشئن الأمواج بمَخْرهن { في البحر كالأعلام } كالجبال الشاهقة، جمع عَلَم، وهو الجبل الطويل، { فبأي آلاء ربكما تُكَذِّبان } مِن خلق مواد السفن والإرشاد إلى أخذها، وكيفية تركيبها، وإجرائها في البحر، بأسباب لا يَقدر على خلقها وجمعها وترتيبها غيره سبحانه
